name: Eponymous
text:
Footstep stops stepping foot/ On the pavement square,/ Ripflows outward where/ Corner meets root,

/ Upward/ Where skyglass shakes,/ Thinly sunlit and beautiful.

/ Vines lace and stitch themselves/ To rare heights,/ Here,/ On the bankdrawn backbones/ Of monied behemoths.

/ Their vicegrip/ Sheds concrete crumbs,/ A handful a day:/ Voracious, clean./
